stripped_text: Whenever you suffer any amount of damage, place 1 power counter on Clan Vengeance. trash: Trash 1 card from HQ at random for each power counter on Clan Vengeance.
text:
Whenever you suffer any amount of damage, place 1 power counter on Clan Vengeance.
[trash]: Trash 1 card from HQ at random for each power counter on Clan Vengeance.
title: Clan Vengeance
